name: Simulate index matches overlapping legacy and composable templates

headers.warning: 299 Elasticsearch-9.2.0-f21c61c5fae5a42d099090840df7b9d6a996f34e "index template [winning_v2_template] has index patterns [test*] matching patterns from existing older templates [v1_template] with patterns (v1_template => [test*, t1*]); this template [winning_v2_template] will take precedence during new index creation"
